description: This source file defines a Svelte component for the header of a web application. It includes navigation, a theme toggle button, and logo display. The component manages the theme state and updates the document's class list accordingly, also persisting the theme choice in local storage.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Toggles between light and dark themes by updating the 'isDark' state and the document's class list, and saves the preference in local storage.

methods.name: updateTheme
methods.description: Applies the current theme to the document's root and body elements by adding/removing appropriate classes, and updates the local storage.
